src:
Satu Agen dengan Paul Pogba, Erling Haaland Ditawarkan Barcelona?
04 Nov 2019, 17:45 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Keinginan Manchester United untuk bisa mendapatkan jasa Erling Braut Haaland terancam pupus. Sebab, Mino Raiola sebagai agen disebut akan memprioritaskan Barcelona dalam proses transfer sang pemain.
Erling Haaland mulai menjadi bidikan banyak klub papan atas Eropa usai tampil bagus di Piala Dunia U-20 tahun 2019 ini. Erling Haaland menjadi top skor dengan mencetak sembilan gol bersama timnas Norwegia U-19.
Erling Haaland kemudian pindah dari Molde. Meskipun sempat dilirik Manchester United, Erling Haaland pindah ke FC Salzburg dengan mahar transfer 5 juta euro. Harga yang diyakini akan berlipat ganda jika dia pindah dalam waktu dekat.
Erling Haaland menunjukkan performa bagus bersama klub asal Austria. Bukan hanya mampu menembus tim utama, pemain berusia 19 tahun juga menjadi mesin gol bagi Slazburg. 12 gol dicetaknya pada laga Bundesliga Austria.
text:
An agent with Paul Pogba, Erling Haaland offered by Barcelona?
Nov 04 2019, 17:45 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manchester United's desire to be able to get the services of Erling Braut Haaland is threatened to disappear. Because, Mino Raiola as an agent is said to prioritize Barcelona in the transfer process of the player.
Erling Haaland began to target many top European clubs after performing well in the 2019 U-20 World Cup. Erling Haaland became the top scorer by scoring nine goals with the Norwegian U-19 national team.
Erling Haaland then moved from Molde. Although it was briefly glanced at Manchester United, Erling Haaland moved to FC Salzburg with a transfer fee of 5 million euros. The price is believed to double if he moves in the near future.
Erling Haaland showed good performance with the Austrian club. Not only able to penetrate the first team, 19-year-old player is also a goal machine for Slazburg. He scored 12 goals in the Austrian Bundesliga match.
